meta_title: The Industrial Maintenance Maturity Model: Assess Your Facility
meta_description: Is your facility stuck in reactive "maintainance" mode? Discover the 4 stages of the Maintenance Maturity Model and how to move from firefighting to prediction.
title: The Industrial Maintenance Maturity Model: Where Does Your Facility Stand?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Industrial Maintenance Maturity Model: Where Does Your Facility Stand?

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot of a modern, clean industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance professionals (men and women) are wearing modern PPE including hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One technician is holding a tablet (back facing the camera) while pointing at a large, complex industrial motor. Another technician is using a handheld thermal imaging camera on a nearby pump. The background shows automated conveyor belts and robotic arms in motion, with soft, cool blue lighting indicating a high-tech environment. No text or words should be visible in the image. The atmosphere should convey professionalism, technology, and proactive control.
